reload_note: â€» If the chat looks outdated for any reason, click the reload button above.
reset_warning: âš  This will reset the conversation on next message. To restore the previous history, click Reload Chat History.
max_turns_note: â€» This controls how many messages {name} remembers. Increasing it may slow down {possessive_determiner} response time.
language_note: â€» This setting affects both the display language and the language used by the AI model.
api_key_warning: âš  Please scroll down to the ğŸ” at the bottom to set up your {service} key
gemini_input_placeholder: Enter your API key starting with AIza
gemini_explanation:
â€» A Google Gemini API key is required for this program to access Google's Gemini services. All processing is done locally and the API key is not permanently stored anywhere.
**Important:** Save your API key somewhere safe - you won't be able to view it again after creating it in Google AI Studio.
gemini_instructions: **How to get a Google Gemini API Key:** 1. Visit Google Cloud Console â€“ Create Project 2. Sign in with your Google account 3. Enter a project name and click **Create** 4. Once the project is created, make sure it is selected in the top bar of the Google Cloud Console 5. Visit Google AI Studio 6. Click "ï¼‹ Create API Key" 7. Select the project you created 8. Click **Create API key in existing project** 9. Copy the new API key and paste it in the field above
elevenlabs_input_placeholder: Enter your API key starting with sk_
elevenlabs_explanation:
â€» An ElevenLabs API key is required for higher quality voice synthesisã€‚All processing is done locally and the API key is not permanently stored anywhere.
**Important:** Save your API key somewhere safe - you won't be able to view it again after creating it in ElevenLabs.
elevenlabs_instructions: **How to get an ElevenLabs API Key:** 1. Visit ElevenLabs 2. Create an account or log in 3. Click "Create API Key" 4. Set the key permissions to 'Text to Speech' and 'Voices (Read Only)' only 5. Click 'Create' 6. Copy the new API key and paste it in the field above
coqui_explanation: â€» Coqui is a service specializing in simple text-to-speech. While it cannot adjust for advanced emotional expression or voice styles, it can be used with ease.
coqui_instructions: This service does not require API key registration. You can use it as is.
sbv2_explanation: â€» Style-BertVITS2 is a text-to-speech service specialized for Japanese that reads the emotion from the text and automatically adjusts the voice's tone. Because it performs advanced processing, generating the audio may take some time.
sbv2_instructions: This service does not require API key registration. You can use it as is.
api_key_status_not_required: âœ… Status: The {service} TTS service is available for immediate use.
change_key_note: Press this button to change your API key
cancel_change_note: Press this button to cancel changing your Google Gemini API Key
shutdown_warning: Are you sure you want to shut down the server? This will close the application.
